front.title: RTP Payload Format for AVS-P2 Video

abstract.t: This memo specifies an RTP payload format for encapsulating AVS-P2 compressed video bit streams, as defined by the Audio Video Coding Standard Workgroup of China (AVS Workgroup). The payload format has wide applicability, as it supports applications from simple low bit-rate conversational usage, to Internet video streaming with interleaved transmission, to high bit-rate video-on-demand.
